doc:
Will Lee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Will_Lee 0 William Lee (August 6, 1908 – December 7, 1982) was an American actor and comedian who appeared in numerous television and film roles, but was best known for playing Mr. Hooper, the original store proprietor of the eponymous Hooper's Store. He was one of the four original human characters on Sesame Street, from the show's debut in November 1969 until his death in 1982. William_Lee ( August_6_,_1908 – December_7_,_1982 ) was an_American_actor and comedian who appeared in numerous_television_and_film_roles , but was_best_known for playing Mr._Hooper , the_original_store_proprietor of the_eponymous_Hooper 's_Store . He was one of the_four_original_human_characters on Sesame_Street , from the_show 's_debut in November_1969 until his_death in 1982 .
